Html:
Hi,
I'm trying to run my first CAL application and I ran into a problem. When debugging BootStrapper.CreateShell I get that Presenter.View = Nothing. I've tried to figure our why by comparing the differences between my application and the StockTrader application. My application is required to be in VB... I'm using VS 2008 and .Net 3.5 SP1.
 Is there something one should add in VB which is not part of the stock trader sample?
what could be other possible reasons for the presenter.view to return as nothing in CreateShell?
Thank you,
Ken

Sorry - I found it and it was a silly mistake caused by converting C# to VB...
Ken
